articles.title: AirAsia X shares sink as much as 21% amid going concern doubt - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: (Nov 1): AirAsia X Bhd’s shares dived by the most in more than a year after the long haul budget airline was officially categorized as a financially distressed firm, which gives the company a year to recast its finances or risk losing its Malaysian listing. T…

articles.title: Walk-ins for Moderna booster doses available for eligible individuals aged 30 and above from Nov 1 - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - All eligible individuals aged 30 and above can walk in to a Moderna vaccination centre for their booster dose from Monday (Nov 1), said the Ministry of Health (MOH) in a statement on Saturday. This applies to Singaporeans, permanent residents and …

articles.title: Natural Resources on Mars Could Produce Rocket Fuel, Say Researchers - IGN SOUTH EAST ASIA
articles.description: Cyanobacteria and E. coli could be the key to Martian rocket fuel.
articles.content:
A new study has discovered that future astronauts who find themselves on Mars may be able to use its natural resources to help make rocket fuel that could assist in getting them back to Earth.
